title: Healing Trauma for Better Health
description: Indigenous groups are taking steps to heal generations of collective trauma resulting from federal policies that called for the destruction of their cultural identities.
sitename: School of Medicine and Health Sciences
cleaned_text: When - Where Online Contacts Indigenous groups are taking steps to heal generations of collective trauma resulting from federal policies that called for the destruction of their cultural identities. Presenters will address communities are addressing emotional, physical, and spiritual well-being by revitalizing cultural traditions.
